description: Provides functionalities for handling SAP Passports
name: sap-e2e-trace

scripts.prepareRelease: find $PWD -name package.json -exec node .filter/filter-package.js {} \; ; rm -rf .filter && find $PWD -name bundle.json -exec node node_modules/whitelist-for-node-packages/clean-bundle.js {} --verbose \; -print -quit && npm prune --production
